about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Premium Collection. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support Anarchy: Wolf's law

The Anarchy: Premium Collection includes the following digital items:
Premium Collection Skin Set.
AK47
SVD
P90
MP5
Glock
Kar98
Val
Pecheneg
Skin Set

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best economical action shooter survival experience for you AWL Team.
detailed_description:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Premium Collection. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support Anarchy: Wolf's law

The Anarchy: Premium Collection includes the following digital items:

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best economical action shooter survival experience for you AWL Team.
name: Anarchy: Premium Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game Anarchy: Wolf's law on Steam in order to play
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Japanese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
